behavior.name: Brohoof
behavior.author: disRecord
behavior.description:
Move leg1 up to specified target, perform greeting, wait and pt leg down.
Robot is assumed to be standing on four legs.

param.name: hoof_shift
param.label: hoof_shift
param.hint: DEPRECATED. Hoof shift toward sweetie from object center during greeting.

param.name: brohoof_cone
param.label: brohoof_cone
param.hint: Do not perform brohoof if angle beetwen direction from shoulder1 to object and robot direction projected on horizontal plane is greater than this value.

param.name: brohof_upper_limit
param.label: brohof_upper_limit
param.hint: Do not perform brohoof if object is higher then this value (meters).

param.name: is_simplified
param.label: is_simplified
param.hint: Do not use move it to perform greeting.
